repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:18.04
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
MAINTAINER Matthias Hochsteger <matthias.hochsteger@tuwien.ac.at>
RUN apt-get update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install python3 libpython3-dev libxmu-dev tk-dev tcl-dev cmake git g++ libglu1-mesa-dev ccache python3-pytest python3-numpy python3-tk clang-tidy python3-distutils clang libopenmpi-dev openmpi-bin gfortran && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ADD . /root/src/netgen
